title: UB40 Announces 2025 US Tour, Including Shows with The English Beat
description: The reggae group will hit 33 cities across the US, with featured support from The English Beat. UB40 Announces 2025 US Tour, Including Shows with The English Beat Jaeden Pinder
author: Jaeden Pinder
excerpt: UB40 are hitting the road in the US in fall 2025 for their “Relentless Tour,” featuring support from The English Beat.
text: UB40 are hitting the road this fall with their “Relentless Tour,” bringing their signature blend of British reggae-pop across the country. They’ll be joined by The English Beat on select dates, with additional support from Inner Circle, Big Mountain, and the Buena Vista Orchestra at various stops along the way. The 33-date outing marks the group’s fourth year in a row playing to American audiences. “No doubt we’ll be clocking up the miles on the road, as we always do with many hours spent on the tour bus,” drummer Jimmy Brown said in a statement, “but American audiences are so much fun to play to and are so loud in their appreciation that it is one of the most rewarding countries to tour.” The English Beat and Inner Circle are also returning to the road with UB40, having provided support on last year’s tour. Get UB40 Tickets Here The US tour kicks off on August 17th in Atlanta. After that, they’ll hit play shows in cities including Orlando, Philadelphia, Seattle, Phoenix, Los Angeles, and more. Their final show is on October 5th in Las Vegas. Tickets for UB40’s “Relentless Tour” go on sale beginning Friday, April 4th at 10:00 a.m. local time via Ticketmaster. UB45, the group’s latest album, was released in 2024. UB40 are hitting the road this fall with their “Relentless Tour,” bringing their signature blend of British reggae-pop across the country. They’ll be joined by The English Beat on select dates, with additional support from Inner Circle, Big Mountain, and the Buena Vista Orchestra at various stops along the way.

The 33-date outing marks the group’s fourth year in a row playing to American audiences. “No doubt we’ll be clocking up the miles on the road, as we always do with many hours spent on the tour bus,” drummer Jimmy Brown said in a statement, “but American audiences are so much fun to play to and are so loud in their appreciation that it is one of the most rewarding countries to tour.” The English Beat and Inner Circle are also returning to the road with UB40, having provided support on last year’s tour.

Get UB40 Tickets Here

The US tour kicks off on August 17th in Atlanta. After that, they’ll hit play shows in cities including Orlando, Philadelphia, Seattle, Phoenix, Los Angeles, and more. Their final show is on October 5th in Las Vegas.

Tickets for UB40’s “Relentless Tour” go on sale beginning Friday, April 4th at 10:00 a.m. local time via Ticketmaster.

UB45, the group’s latest album, was released in 2024.
